metadata.title: CVE-2019-17672 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
WordPress before 5.2.4 is vulnerable to a stored XSS attack to injectJavaScript into STYLE elements.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4+dfsg1-1').
